text: Orsini Carota (active 16th-century) was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period, active in Perugia. ==Biography== Born in Assisi, he was a pupil of the painter Pompeo Cocchi. He was active in 1583.Catalogo dei quadri che si conservano nella Pinacoteca Vannucci in Perugia, by Galleria Nazionale dell'Umbria, (1903) page 61. ==References== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:People from Perugia Category:Umbrian painters Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Italian Renaissance painters
title: Orsino Carota
